Description: Does not require you to posses or expend any components or items of power

Requires you to expend an spell component worth at least 1 gp
or posses a special focus worth at least 20 gp (eg. a magic crystal)

Requires you to expend an spell component worth at least 10 gp
or posses a special focus worth at least 200 gp (eg. a wand)

Requires you to expend an spell component worth at least 50 gp
or posses a special focus worth at least 1000 gp (eg. a legendary magic staff)
